Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $8,000 to me. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a fantastic deal considering its original value and the benefits it offers. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
